ovdesc.p: This table is used to set the broker commission and stock exchange fees based on Security type, Security domicile and transaction type
Record id of this table is B-(broker number) for broker commission and S-(stock exchange) for stock exchange fees

desc.p: Describes the fees setup
This field is used to search and default commission code for calculating the broker commission and stock exchange fees.
Value stored in this field is SECURITY.TYPE*DOMICILE*TRANSACTION.TYPE.
Fields from Index to Bond Broker Comm are associative multi value set.
This field is a No input field and will be defaulted based on the values in the field SECURITY.TYPE, DOMICILE and TRANSACTION.TYPE
Values accepted are SECURITY.MASTER reference, Asset type prefixed by A-, Sub asset type prefixed by S- and ALL.
0-20 alphanumeric characters is allowed (Mandatory input)
Values accepted are valid COUNTRY code or ALL.
0 to 3 numeric characters (Mandatory input)
Values accepted are any valid BUY/SEL code or ALL
0 to 3 string characters (Mandatory input)
Values accepted are broker number and ALL.
The broker number should be a BROKER in the field Customer.Type of CUSTOMER.SECURITY.
Fields from Broker.Number to Bond.Ebv.Fees are associative sub value set.
0 to 11 numeric characters
Input is allowed only when the id is a stock exchange prefixed by S-.
Value is a valid id from the table FT.COMMISSION.TYPE.
The commission code entered here is used to calculate the stock exchange fees for a broker i.e. field BR.EBV.FEES in SEC.TRADE for a share type of security.
Input is allowed only when the id is a stock exchange prefixed by S-.
Value is a valid id from the table FT.COMMISSION.TYPE.
The commission code entered here is used to calculate the stock exchange fees for a broker i.e. field BR.EBV.FEES in SEC.TRADE for a bond type of security.
Input is allowed only when the id is a stock exchange prefixed by S-.
Values accepted are stock exchange id and ALL.
The stock exchange should be a valid id from STOCK.EXCHANGE table.
Fields from Stock.Exchange to Bond.Broker.Comm are associative sub value set.
0 to 5 characters
Input is allowed only when the id is a broker number prefixed by B-.
Value is a valid id from the table FT.COMMISSION.TYPE.
The commission code entered here is used to calculate the broker commission in the broker side i.e. field BR.BROK.COMM in SEC.TRADE for a share type of security.
Input is allowed only when the id is a broker number prefixed by B-.
Value is a valid id from the table FT.COMMISSION.TYPE.
The commission code entered here is used to calculate the broker commission in the broker side i.e. field BR.BROK.COMM in SEC.TRADE for a bond type of security.
Input is allowed only when the id is a broker number prefixed by B-.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
